definition: to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: But is the annotation approach better?
sentences.chinese: 但是注解方法会更好吗？

sentences.english: Without notes, I can hardly understand ancient Chinese prose.
sentences.chinese: 注解，我根本看不懂这些白文。

sentences.english: He made the explaination in detail so that the student would have no difficulty with this book.
sentences.chinese: 他做了详细的注解，使学生们读这本书没有困难。

sentences.english: The first workspace is for collections of annotations.
sentences.chinese: 第一个工作空间是注解的集合。

sentences.english: I noticed that there were comments in the margins of my spec.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到在我的说明空白处写着一些注解。

sentences.english: Hengda property, gold property, I would like to note life with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 恒达物业，金牌物业，谨以微笑注解风华人生。

sentences.english: It thrills them to annotate their textbooks with first-hand information.
sentences.chinese: 学生们兴奋于有第一手资料注解他们的课本。

sentences.english: The second point is that the system changes redquin destiny view of Han people and music system in the comments.
sentences.chinese: 二为汉代人天命观和礼乐制度的变化在注解中的体现。

sentences.english: The trigger should fail if the comment does not conform to the format.
sentences.chinese: 如果注解没有遵守格式的话，那么激发就会失败。

sentences.english: Augmenting or overriding the annotation-based metadata with metadata from some other source
sentences.chinese: 通过外部注解增强或是提供基于注解的元数据。

sentences.english: Augmenting or overriding the annotation-based metadata with metadata from some other source
sentences.chinese: 通过外部注解增强或是提供基于注解的元数据。

sentences.english: But I plead them to take the time to reconsider their choices about the annotations.
sentences.chinese: 但是我恳请他们花时间重新考虑关于注解的决定。

sentences.english: The annotation processor will then generate the Business Interface.
sentences.chinese: 那么注解处理器将会产生业务接口。

sentences.english: The following reasons can work cause of my opinion.
sentences.chinese: 以下情由可以说明注解我的主张。

sentences.english: The collection of quotations was an after-thought.
sentences.chinese: 收集引用他人的注解是后来想到的。

sentences.english: Be badly in need of Li Qingzhao and sentimental and grieved Li Yu poem word , have annotation more well.
sentences.chinese: 急需李清照和李煜伤感和悲痛的诗词，有注解更好。
